name: Desert Ruin
description:
DESERT RUIN
After a sandstorm, you have to figure out the secrets of a ruin in the desert to find your way back home.
==================
A mini visual novel
created for the O2A2 jam:
- one background
- one sprite
<1000 words
==================
Known bugs and issues:
- one line of dialog is attached to the wrong character
- does not work on mobile
- sound is a bit loud, so make sure to turn down the volume in the settings!
==================
This is a prolog for "There have been Gods", a passion project that I'd love to create sometime.
So just treat it as a little sneak peak into the story!
